meanings.definition: A person who dedicates something to a particular cause or purpose.
meanings.sent1: The dedicators of the new library were proud of their contribution.
meanings.sent2: The dedicators of the monument worked tirelessly to honor the fallen soldiers.
meanings.sent3: The dedicators of the bake sale were thrilled to see the community come together.
meanings.sent4: The dedicators of the charity event shone brightly in the eyes of those they helped.
meanings.sent5: The dedicators of the school garden were like nurturing gardeners, tending to every plant with care.

meanings.definition: Those who dedicate or devote themselves to a specific task or goal.
meanings.sent1: The dedicators of the project put their hearts and souls into its success.
meanings.sent2: The dedicators of the marathon trained hard to reach the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The dedicators of the dance competition were determined to show off their skills.
meanings.sent4: The dedicators of the environmental cleanup were like superheroes saving the planet.
meanings.sent5: The dedicators of the art exhibition poured their creativity into every piece on display.
